thread.title: 15-Year-Old Girl Sexually Assaulted By Multiple Attackers On Facebook Live
thread.title_full: 15-Year-Old Girl Sexually Assaulted By Multiple Attackers On Facebook Live

author: Perez Hilton
title: 15-Year-Old Girl Sexually Assaulted By Multiple Attackers On Facebook Live
text:
Up to 40 people reportedly watched multiple assailants sexually assault a 15-year-old girl on Facebook Live Sunday, according to Chicago police.
The victim went missing when she didn't return home after being dropped off by a relative, who claims to have been the last to see her before the attack.
Hours later, her family discovered a video on the Internet showing the high school freshman being attacked by "five or six" men.
Related: Terror In London -- Get The Latest On The Westminster Attack 
After getting wind of the alarming video, cops began a search for the teen, who was ultimately found crying on a neighbor's porch on Tuesday. She was released to her mother after receiving treatment at a nearby hospital.
No arrests have been made yet, but CPD Spokesman Anthony Guglielmi tweeted an update on the scary situation: 
UPDATE: CPD making good progress identifying persons of interest in 10th Dist assault. Interviews ongoing but no formal suspects named yet
â€” Anthony Guglielmi (@AJGuglielmi) March 21, 2017 
As the authorities pursue an investigation , a relative spoke out to the Chicago Tribune , saying:
"It hurts me to my core because I was one of the last people to see her [before the alleged attack]. I want to make sure this never happens to anybody else's kids, and if that starts with taking down this one group, I'll make that my life's mission."
Adding:
"If we don't stand up and do anything about it now, who knows if the next kid this happens to, maybe they don't get to come home. Maybe this doesn't get to have a happy ending."
Thus far neither the people who streamed the video to Facebook, nor the dozens of viewers, have been officially identified.
We'll keep you updated as we learn more.
[ Image via Facebook . ]
